newsitem.title: FRANCE: French stocks up in record volume on block trades.
newsitem.headline: French stocks up in record volume on block trades.

text.p: French stocks were up firmly in early afternoon trade in record turnover due to huge block trades on the first day of the new monthly account.
* CAC-40 index up 22.50 points, or 0.81 percent, at 2,784.70 at 1255 GMT
* CAC-40 June futures contract up 16.5 at 2,775.5
* Volume was 13.6 billion francs, swollen by block trades of 3.18 million shares in Total, 2.1 million shares in Elf Aquitaine, 1.55 million in Rhone Poulenc, and 724,000 shares in Alcatel Alsthom.
